attributes.action: Test GPs annually, in regard to fitness to practice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring in legislation, that makes it a statutory offence, for Gp's to have a contract of employment with an NHS Health authority, unless they have submitted to, and passed! an annual fitness to practice test. This test,would be rigorous in its scope, and require a pass over 90% in all areas encompasssed.The test would also be administered, by an independant body,outwith the NHS,BMA,GMC who would be responsible and answerable directly to Parliament.
